</div>

### Install

```bash
npm install --save vm-editor
```

### Usage

```js
import VmEditor from 'vm-editor'
```

Trigger upload event by click upload button 

```html
<VmEditor width="950px" 
          height="400px" 
          @upload="showHtml">
</VmEditor>
...
methods: {
  getHtml: function (data) {
    //data contains html string for render
  }
}
```
